advancement.easy_mob_farm.root.descripti: Begin your journey into mob farming technology with your first template!
advancement.easy_mob_farm.root.title: Mob Farm Mastery
advancement.easy_mob_farm.tier0_template: Create the basic tier template to get started.
advancement.easy_mob_farm.tier1_template: Build up your mob farm and improve your technique.
advancement.easy_mob_farm.tier2_template: Create a stronger mob farm with Tier 2.
advancement.easy_mob_farm.tier3_template: Reach the highest level of your mob farming technique!
text.easy_mob_farm.animal_plains_farm: Farm designed for plains animals, perfect for livestock mobs.
text.easy_mob_farm.bee_hive_farm: Specialized farm for bee mobs and honey collection.
text.easy_mob_farm.desert_farm: Farm optimized for desert creatures, suited for arid mobs.
text.easy_mob_farm.iron_golem_farm: Farm tailored for iron golems, ideal for golem creatures.
text.easy_mob_farm.jungle_farm: Ideal for jungle creatures, supporting exotic and tropical mobs.
text.easy_mob_farm.lucky_drop_farm: Farm designed for lucky drops, perfect for rare item mobs.
text.easy_mob_farm.mob_farm_template: The base structure for all mob farms.
text.easy_mob_farm.mob_is_not_on_allow_l: The mob %s is not on the allow list for this item.
text.easy_mob_farm.mob_is_on_deny_list: The mob %s is on the deny list for this item.
text.easy_mob_farm.monster_plains_cave_f: Focused on plains monsters, including common hostile mobs.
text.easy_mob_farm.nether_fortress_farm: Farm tailored for Nether mobs, ideal for fortress creatures.
text.easy_mob_farm.ocean_farm: Designed for oceanic creatures, suited for water-based mobs.
text.easy_mob_farm.swamp_farm: Perfect for swamp creatures, supporting marsh-dwelling mobs.
text.easy_mob_farm.too_large_to_capture: The mob %s is too large to capture with this item.
text.easy_mob_farm.too_strong_to_capture: The mob %s is too strong to capture, try weakening it first.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.big_slot_upgrade: Expands the mob storage capacity in the farm by %s.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.captured_mob_slot: Place a captured mob in this slot to begin processing in the mob farm.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.egg_collector_enha: Automates the collection of eggs from chickens with a hopper integrated beneath a hay nest.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.enhancement_slot: Use this slot to enhance the mob farm's output.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.experience_enhance: Allows the mob farm to collect experience orbs as experience bottles.
Requires a mob that yields at least %s experience points.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.farm.killed_by_pla: Requires sword enhancement for some loot!
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.farm.lucky_drop_wa: âš  Warning: Mob may escape on unlucky drop!
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.filter_slot: Use this slot to filter items from the mob farm output.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_blac: A shadowy catalyst for dark Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_blue: A tranquil catalyst for calm blue Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_brow: An earthy catalyst creating warm brown Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_cold: A freezing catalyst for producing icy Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_cyan: A cool catalyst for vivid cyan Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_gray: A muted catalyst for dim gray Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_gree: A natural catalyst that spawns leafy green Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_ligh: A breezy catalyst that creates sky-tinted Frog Lights.
A neutral catalyst yielding pale gray Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_lime: A zesty catalyst for vibrant lime Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_mage: A mystical catalyst for shimmering magenta Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_oran: A fiery catalyst for glowing orange Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_pink: A lovely catalyst producing soft pink Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_purp: A royal catalyst that crafts deep purple Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_red_: An intense catalyst producing crimson red Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_temp: A balanced catalyst for obtaining pale Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_warm: A heat-infused catalyst that generates warm Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_whit: A pure catalyst that yields bright Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.frog_catalyst_yell: A radiant catalyst for sunny yellow Frog Lights.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.honey_extractor_en: Extracts honey bottles from processed bees.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.loot_enhancement: Enhances the quantity of loot collected by the mob farm.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.luck_enhancement: Boosts the chance for rare item drops.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.milk_bottle: A bottle of milk, perfect for removing potion effects.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.milk_extractor_enh: Automatically milks cows in the mob farm.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.mob_capture_card.m: Loot quantity depends on slime size!
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.mob_catcher.captur: â–º Target mob and right-click to capture
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.mob_catcher.name: Name: %s
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.mob_catcher.releas: â–º Right click on empty place to release %1$s
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.no_flowers_filter: Excludes all flower drops from collection.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.no_meat_filter: Excludes all meat drops from collection.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.pollen_trap_enhanc: Collects pollen to generate flowers or dyes.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.sheep_enhancement: Automatically shears sheep in the mob farm.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.slot_upgrade_slot: Use this slot to upgrade the mob farm's output slots.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.small_slot_upgrade: Adds additional mob storage capacity in the farm by %s.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.speed_enhancement: Speeds up the rate by +%s ticks/sec at which items are collected.
tooltip.easy_mob_farm.sword_enhancement: Generates loot as if killed by a player with a sword.
